attributes.action: Hold political parties legally accountable for misleading facts in campaigns.
attributes.additional_details: It's about time that political parties start to campaign honestly and with hard evidence to back up their claims. No more of this they said this they said that rubbish. No more fluffing of figures or tweaking of information. Give us all the REAL information and let us democratically vote based on that.
attributes.background:
Time and time again debates on important issues are filled with false claims, inaccurate figures and blatant lies on both sides of every argument.

Parties and politicians should be held accountable to the same advertising and trading standards everyone else has to adhere to.

rejection.details:
Parliament can only hold the Government and politicians to account politically, not legally. It's not clear what you want Parliament or the Government to do. If you want it to become a criminal offence for a politician to mislead the public, you could sign this petition:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/123348
